titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the 50th anniversary of the date of enactment of the Architectural Barriers Act of 1968.
Recognizing and honoring the 50th anniversary of the date of enactment of the Architectural Barriers Act of 1968.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Recognizes and honors the 50th anniversary of the enactment of the Architectural Barriers Act of 1968.
Reaffirms support for this Act.
